amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Defense to use amounts appropriated or otherwise made available to the Department of Defense to provide testing for elevated blood lead levels at military treatment facilities for babies during their 12-month and 24-month wellness checks or annual physical examinations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3841 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
